title: Raise the Stakes
description: Fill your inventory with golden apples
trophy: The Most Golden Apple In The World

title: Red + Red = Brown
description: Get a Brown Mooshroom by breeding two Red Mooshrooms

title: Riddle Me That
description:
The first is to use igloo technology to speed up curing
The second is to melt the frost with your own flame
The third is to seal the four elements within a pot
The fourth is to fill your inventory, yet keep it empty
The fifth is to go everywhere at once
The sixth is to collect all the references of the silent "Shhh..."
The seventh is to maintain the law: sharp below, soft above – a balance that cannot be overturned
The eighth is to end the duel of the frostbitten undead riders, on the grounds of differing legs
The ninth is to chase a Cat through its nine lives without losing track
The tenth is to make a deal with a clucking trader
req:
1. Heal a zombie villager so that at the moment of transformation, at least one iron bar is within a 2-block radius around it
2. While on fire, sit in a cauldron with powder snow
3. Craft a decorated pot using burn, flow, angler, and miner pottery sherds
4. Fill every inventory slot with one light gray stained glass pane
5. Press Forward, Back, Right, and Left simultaneously
6. Collect a creeper head, creeper banner pattern, chiseled sandstone, cyan glazed terracotta, danger pottery sherd, banner with creeper pattern,shield with creeper banner, firework with creeper shape, and firework star with creeper shape in your inventory
7. Place a wool or moss carpet on grass by aiming at a side block, then place a pointed dripstone underneath it so that it hangs from the carpet
8.Kill a Stray on a horse while it's fighting a Stray on a spider, or vice versa
9. Kill cats of the same variant 9 times in a row
10. Trade with a villager sitting on a chicken, after healing a small zombie villager on a chicken

req: Plant Sugarcane on Grass Block, Dirt, Coarse Dirt, Rooted Dirt, Podzol, Mycelium, Sand, Red Sand, Suspicious Sand, Moss Block, Mud

title: Bat-Man
description: Kill 64 Bats

title: Chief Spide
description: Fill your inventory with cobweb

title: Copper King
description: Stand on a chest filled with copper blocks

title: Deepslated Miner
description: Collect two blocks of deepslate emerald ore

title: Deepslate Master
description: Mine 16 blocks of all forms of deepslate
req: Mine 16 blocks of: Reinforced Deepslate, Deepslate, Cobbled Deepslate, Cobbled Deepslate Wall, Chiseled Deepslate, Cobbled Deepslate Stairs, Cobbled Deepslate Slab, Polished Deepslate, Polished Deepslate Stairs, Polished Deepslate Slab, Polished Deepslate Wall, Deepslate Bricks, Cracked Deepslate Bricks, Deepslate Brick Stairs, Deepslate Brick Slab, Deepslate Brick Wall, Deepslate Tiles, Cracked Deepslate Tiles, Deepslate Tile Stairs, Deepslate Tile Slab, Deepslate Tile Wall

title: Distorted Cave Maze
description: Stay in a deep cave without sunlight and moonlight for 3 days
req: Be in the Deep Dark, Dripstone or Lush Caves biome or under y=20 without seeing the sky light for one hour

title: Light at the End of the Tunnel
description: Place the lantern in a dark place in the cave
req: Place a lantern on a block with light level 0

title: Pointy Problems
description: Take damage from a stalactite falling on you

title: Redstoner
description: Fill your inventory with redstone

title: Reinforced Miner
description: Mine one block of reinforced deepslate

title: The Master of Falls
description: Fall on each block that softens falls
req: Fall on a Sweet Berry Bush, Water, Cobweb, Lava, Slime Block, Hay Block, Honey Block, any type of Bed, Scaffolding, Powder Snow

title: Time Killer
description: Fill your inventory with obsidian

title: Arachnophobia
description: Kill every Spider with effects that they can naturally spawn with a single piercing arrow
req: Kill Spiders with this effects with a single piercing shot: Regeneration, Invisibility, Strength, Speed

title: Born to Spawn
description: Stand on all types of naturally generated monster spawners
req: Stand on a Blaze, Spider, Zombie, Skeleton, Silverfish, Cave Spider, and Magma Cube spawners

title: Frozen Heart
description: Kill a Stray while in a snow biome during a snowstorm with hunger and slowness effects, taking damage from powdering snow with a slowness arrow

title: Get Out of My Sky
description: Get killed by a Phantom while you are 320 blocks up in the sky

title: High Explosives
description: Stand on a barrel filled with gunpowder

title: I Uh... Forgot a Composter
description: Be near 20 Ravagers (have them all within 32 blocks of you)

title: Live Cactus
description: Kill the Elder Guardian in the desert

title: More Impossible
description: Kill the Wither with an arrow
req: Kill the Wither while handing any type of arrow in the mainhand

title: Not That Impossible
description: Be killed by a Husk while riding a Camel

title: One Minute Warden's Hugs
description: Stay within 5 blocks of a Warden for 1 minute

title: Phantom Rider
description: Catch a Phantom with a fishing rod

title: Spider's Lair
description: Find the secret "Spider Room" in a Woodland Mansion and stand on the Spider Spawner inside it

title: Suspicious Duel
description: Look at a Skeleton who decided to have a duel with another Skeleton using a spyglass

title: The Inquisition
description: Burn the Witch at the campfire while it runs away from your sword
req: Hit a Witch and then kill it by using a campfire

title: The Undertaker's Revenge
description: Kill a Phantom at the bottom of the world with an iron shovel
req: Kill Phantom on y < -60 with an iron shovel

title: A Long Journey
description: Ride at least 300 meters on a lava lake riding a Strider in the End

title: Bastion Robber
description: Loot all types of chests from the bastion

title: Bastion Sweet Bastion
description: Barter with a Piglin in a bastion with a golden axe in the main hand while wearing the Piglin's head and a piece of the golden armor

title: Beyond the Rings
description: Use an Eye of Ender when you're over 50,000 blocks away from the nearest Stronghold

title: Blaze3D
description: Kill three Blazes with a single piercing shot

title: Diamond Beacon
description: Create a full power beacon that consists entirely of diamond blocks

title: Emerald Beacon
description: Create a full power beacon that consists entirely of emerald blocks

title: Firefox
description: Bring a red Fox in the Nether
req: Have a red Fox within 16 blocks of you in the Nether

title: Flap, Don't Fall
description: Visit all the Nether biomes in one flight while staying below the roof of the Nether

title: Give Them Everything They Want
description: Give every possible item to Piglins
req: Give these items to the Piglin: Bell, Block of Gold, Block of Raw Gold, Clock, Deepslate Gold Ore, Enchanted Golden Apple, Glistering Melon Slice, Gilded Blackstone, Gold Ingot, Gold Ore, Golden Apple, Golden Axe, Golden Boots, Golden Carrot, Golden Chestplate, Golden Helmet, Golden Hoe, Golden Horse Armor, Golden Leggings, Golden Pickaxe, Golden Shovel, Golden Sword, Light Weight Pressure Plate, Nether Gold Ore, Raw Gold, Gold Nugget

title: Gold Beacon
description: Create a full power beacon that consists entirely of gold blocks

title: Herbarium to My Friend
description: Give a baby Piglin all kinds of flowers
req: Give these flowers to the Baby Piglin: Azure Bluet, Allium, Blue Archid, Dandelion, Lily of the Valley, Corn Flower, Red Tulip, White Tulip, Pink Tulip, Orange Tulip, Poppy, Torchflower, Wither Rose, Oxeye Daisy, Sunflower, Rose Bush, Pitcher Plant, Peony, Lilac, Wither Rose, Closed Eyeblossom, Open Eyeblossom

title: High Pitch
description: Kill 7 Ghasts in a row with their Fireballs, while not missing the blows from them

title: Hot Combat
description: Die from a Blaze while having fire resistance effect

title: Hot Lake
description: Use a fishing rod to hook a Salmon from the lava in the Nether

title: Impostor
description: Ride a Pig in the Nether

title: Inside Out
description: Use an Eye of Ender to locate a Stronghold... Inside the Stronghold!

title: Iron Beacon
description: Create a full power beacon that consists entirely of iron blocks

title: Netherite Beacon!
description: Create a full power beacon that consists entirely of netherite blocks

title: Never Careful Enough
description: Ensure you won't take damage from that magma block
req: Stand on a Magma block with frost walker enchantment on the boots and fire resistance effect

title: Rainbow!
description: Place all kinds of colored glass directly above a beacon

title: Show the Wither His Home
description: Kill the Wither in all the Nether biomes
req: Kill the Wither in Crimson Forest, Warped Forest, Soul Sand Valley, Basalt Deltas and Nether Wastes

title: The Last Deal
description: Trade with a Piglin in the Overworld and a Villager in the Nether

title: The New Swamp Won't Be Here
description: Bring all kinds of Frogs, a Bogged and Slime to Basalt Deltas and then kill them all with a single piercing shot

title: Withering Depths
description: Summon and kill the Wither in an ancient city

title: Armor in a Bottle
description: Brew a Strong Lingering Potion of the Turtle Master

title: Cowabunga It Is
description: Kill a Turtle that is under the effect of a turtle master potion

title: Flashlight
description: Have Night Vision and Darkness effects at the same time

title: Healed by Pain
description: Take damage from an arrow with a strong healing effect

title: Jump for Joy
description: Kill every jumping mob while both you and it have the jump boost effect
req: Kill a Rabbit, Slime, Magma Cube, Frog, Goat while both you and them have a Jump Boost Effect

title: Master of Effects
description: Get all the max level effects possible during your life (not all at the same time)
req: Have all the effects of a certain level or higher not at the same time: Speed 2, Slowness 6, Strength 2, Jump Boost 2, Regeneration 2, Fire Resistance 1, Water Breathing 1, Invisibility 1, Night Vision 1, Weakness 1, Poison 2, Wither 2, Haste 2, Mining Fatigue 3, Levitation 1, Glowing 1, Absorption 4, Hunger 3, Nausea 1, Resistance 4, Slow Falling 1, Conduit Power 1, Dolphins Grace 1, Blindness 1, Hero of the Village 5, Darkness 1, Oozing 1, Weaving 1, Infested 1, Wind Charged 1, Raid Omen 5, Bad Omen 5, Trial Omen 1

title: Trial Potions
description: Be under the effects of Trial Omen, Oozing, Infested, Wing Charged and Weaving at the same time

title: Worst Cleric in the World
description: Fill your entire inventory with corrupted potions
req: Fill your inventory with Mundane or Thick potions

title: You're Not the Zillager
description: Try to cure yourself from Zombification
req: Have Weakness, Absorption and Regeneration 2 effects at the same time

title: Crafting Lockdown
description: Open a crafter with all slots disabled

title: Craft Me ALL!
description: Craft every redstone component using a crafter
req: Craft the following items with the Crafter: Redstone, Redstone Torch, Redstone Block, Repeater, Comparator, Target, Lever, Oak Button, Stone Button, Oak Pressure Plate, Stone Pressure Plate, Light-Weighted Pressure Plate, Heavy-Weighted Pressure Plate, Calibrated Sculk Sensor, Amethyst Block, White Wool, Tripwire Hook, Lectern, Daylight Detector, Lightning Rod, Piston, Sticky Piston, Slime Block, Honey Block, Dispenser, Dropper, Hopper, Chest, Barrel, Chiseled Bookshelf, Furnace, Trapped Chest, Jukebox, Observer, Note Block, Composter, Cauldron, Rail, Powered Rail, Detector Rail, Activator Rail, Minecart, Hopper Minecart, Chest Minecart, Furnace Minecart, TNT Minecart, Oak Boat with Chest, Bamboo Raft with Chest, Oak Door, Iron Door, Oak Fence Gate, Oak Trapdoor, Iron Trapdoor, TNT, Redstone Lamp, Armor Stand, Decorated Pot, Crafter, Copper Bulb

description: Place an observer facing sugarcane or bamboo
